title: Sweet & Sour Pani Puri / Golgappa/ Gup Chup
content:
Ingredients: Puri's - as required Stuffing: Finely chopped Sweet corn ðŸŒ½Â - 1/2 cup Green bell pepper/ Capsicum - 1/2 cup Onion - 1/2 cup Grated carrot Â - 1/4 cup Coriander chopped - 2 tb sp Red chilly flakes - 1/2 teaspoon Garam Masala - 1/4 teaspoon Red chilli powder/ Paprika - 1/4 teaspoon Salt - to taste Pani: Tamarind extract Â - 1/2 cup Chat Masala powder - 1 teaspoon Garam Masala Â - 1/2 teaspoon Red chilli powder - 1/4 teaspoon Amchur powder - 1/2 teaspoon Coriander+Mint+ 4 green chillies paste - 2 tb sp Jaggery powder - 2 tb sp Salt - as per taste Procedure:
  • You can make Puri's at home. I will show how to prepare them in my upcoming posts
Stuffing:
  • In a bowl mix finely chopped capsicum/ Green Bell pepper, Sweet corn and onion
  • Mix them well
  • Add red chilly flakes, paprika, garam masala and salt
  • Mix them well and keep aside
  • Stuffing is ready
Pani:
  • In a bowl add tamarind extract, chat masala, red chilli powder, garam masala, amchur powder, jaggery powder and salt
  • Mix them well and add sufficient water to it
  • Add chopped coriander and mix
  • Pani is ready
Pani puri:
  • Arrange puri's in plate
  • On each puri make hole at center of it
  • Fill up the puri with stuffing
  • Pour Pani in each puri
  • Garnish with grated carrot and coriander
  • Serve it as a snack at evening, rainy season and winter season ðŸ˜ƒ
